Are you bored with regular fidget spinner games?? We are presenting you an amazing blend of superhero games and avengers theme with fidget spinner games.

here is Another masterpiece for the lovers of superhero games.Superhero Fidget Spinner brings you a wide range of spinners including Spiderman, Batman, Superman, Hulk, Ironman, Captain America and Thor spinners.

you can try different superhero spinners that you want and can see the amazing unique visuals for each spinner.
upgrade spinners to boost our spinner coin production to unlock more superheroes spinners in your inventory.unlock spinners for more upgraded functionality.

- Realistic Superheros fidget spinner simulator with Avengers theme.
- Bunch of superhero spinners including avengers like SpiderMan, Superman, Batman, IronMan, Thor, Hulk, CaptainAmerica spinners.
- You Can Upgrade/unlock any spinner to boost our coin production.
- Glow, laser and neon graphics have shown even more details of the spinners

- compete on global leaderboards.

- swipe left/right or swipe circular on the screen to spin the fidget spinner

- You can unlock fidget spinners by getting coins through spinning.

comments: The game is great. However is pretty sad that see no update on this for 2 months time. And within this period there are some players still able to upgrade the armor and weapon by real money. It do make me feel like giving upon this game now.  Thanks for update, the game look more 3d and better effect... Now is waiting for chapter 3.haha

I love the series more and more with every installment. Great game, with simple aesthetics and a fun way to coklect gear and powers. The animations are rag-dolly sometimes but other than that it's perfect. I have one suggestion for Nekki. Why aren't you guys making games for consoles? You're too advanced for mobile. You could be the future mortal kombat sensation.

Graphics are awesome, it controls and plays very well. Fights are slick and intense with wonderful animation that makes great use of slow-mo to highlight big moves and finishing hits. The only real barrier to me giving this a full hearted recommendation is that there are microtransactions ALL OVER THE PLACE. If you don't like those distracting you constantly, not the game for you.

Loved the new BGM... ABSOLUTELY beautiful. Just one thing, please make the animation speed a little bit more fast. It's slightly annoying to wait that long for a window to open to show the equipments or switch between armour and equipments. Please note that.  But overall...it's the best game I've ever played. Kudos

Simply World's best game. This is the best game I Have played. Good graphics and amazing gameplay. But it's mission are pretty hard.I have a request can you please make a second name change because when I first started playing in excitement to play this game I had chosen a bad name and I wanted to change it. And I think like me many players had done this so please think about this.

I want you to add a option of 'Multiplayer' so that we can play the game with our friends too. Perhaps the game is awesome. Loved it.
description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes
descriptionHTML:
Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations.

CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE

Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality.

AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY

Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!


DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE

Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide!

MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION.

There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only.

Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell:

- Smooth animations and lifelike physics
- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics
- Lots of gear and weapons to collect
- Gorgeous visuals
- Three unique factions and fighting styles
- Hundreds of perks and supermoves
- Character creation tool
- Diverse fighting modes

recentChanges: Strange things are going on in the woods!
Defeat the forest cult and acquire a whole new set of unique equipment!
In this update, we present you a Sanguine March event:
- A new event fight: face the mysterious cult lurking deep in the woods!
- A new event boss: defeat the cult's sinister leader!
- Collect Event Trophies and collect a set of unique gear!
This update also fixes bugs related to resources loading and UI.
summary: An epic Fighting/RPG series returns! Master the shadows and challenge your foes!
title: Shadow Fight 3

descriptionHTML:
Help the rolling ball escape the traps and unlock featured themes.
An addictive thrilling game “Scrolling Ball in Sky” landing on Google Play market now. The future door opens for you from the moment you tap on the screen.
The game features:
● Unique gameplay: help the balls rolling farther and farther away by swiping left or right.
● 3D scene design combined with rock music brings you addictive pleasure.
● Exciting levels: volcano scapes, city scape, desert scape, garden scape and rolling sky scape etc.!
● Fantastic balls: discover all the secrets it holds by rolling balls, or equips in rainbow shop.
● Invite your Facebook friends to challenge your unbeaten record!
Be attention to the roll ball story, you may get a chance to play spin wheel to obtain an unexpected surprise. Do not indulge in the game or you may costs 24 hours in rolling the balls. Very easy to play but very hard to reach the top records!

comments: It was fun while it lasted. I was a big fan of the first game and this one was an awesome improvement. Unfortunately my game crashed after months of playing and forced me to play the tutorial again. UPDATE: After reaching out to Pikpok customer service they reset my story progress and gifted me several leveled up weapons that help balance out what I lost. I appreciate their rapid response and look forward to playing more!

3 stars because although the game is fantastic in what it is, it needs optimization for slightly older devices such as my S7 Edge. I had to scale down to 720p screen res to be able to get a good enough framerate. And yes. I already tried playing on low graphics settings (in-game) before i changed my phone's resolution.

Is exciting game..  Lil harder than most games.  It takes lot of practice to make it thru levels.  Also it could give a bit more silver so u can upgrade guns. Cant move forward in game because I can't get enough Silver to upgrade my guns. But all in all fun play!

I'm currently trying to figure out what's going on with the Elite Chapter 2 (Game 13 - Blackwell Interchange). One of the five instructions is to run along 14 empty train cars. I've tried everything and cannot achieve the star. Any ideas? This is a weak link in an otherwise great and challenging game.

I love this game has a couple bugs. But pikpok support has gone above and beyond each and every single time I have had a prob. Especially one person Tim has personally helped me with what ever issue I was having and never not one time switch me to someone else. That man needs a raise and a promotion. So far I have had a total of 15 issue and come to find out it's my phone not the game. Thank you Tim!!!

After i reach chapter 4, suddenly all my weapons progress are gone,  then i contact the support team,  and they dont restore my previous weapons,  but they give me MORE than what i have before. üòÑ  I really happy with this,  and i really appreciate this.  You guys should try this game. This is AWESOME. Now it's time for me to kill more zombies üòé

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the hit zombie action game Into the Dead (70+ million downloads)!

Journey through the zombie apocalypse in a race to save your family. Arm yourself with an arsenal of powerful weapons and do whatever it takes to survive. Maim, mow down, and massacre the Dead - anything to keep moving! In a world where no one is safe, how far will you go to make it out alive?

FEATURES:
• Evolving story and multiple endings - complete 7 action-packed chapters, 60 stages, and hundreds of challenges
• Powerful weapons and ammo perks - unlock and upgrade melee weapons, firearms, explosives, and more!
• Varied gameplay - fire from military gun emplacements, slay the hordes from atop vehicles, stab them to stay alive, or risk going after them on foot
• Multiple, immersive environments - discover different locations, from oil fields and military bases to campsites and rural farm communities
• Ever-increasing zombie threats - adapt your tactics to annihilate different hordes, including armoured and running zombies!
• Daily and special event modes - prove your skills to win exclusive prizes
• Loyal canine companions - fend off zombies and stay protected in the field

External storage permissions are required to ensure a smooth launch experience for all users

Into the Dead 2 is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

We love to hear from our players! On Twitter? Drop us a line @PikPokGames and join the conversation with #IntoTheDead

Storage: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage

comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked onüòÅ

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ üòÉüëç

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

Who doesn't love this game? It's bone chilling and exciting for the whole family (Litterally my whole fam plays this game) it would be cool to have a mode where there was no granny just to explore the house and get a feel for how to escape. Also some weapons to attack granny. Lastly a map of where granny is would be super cool. Good luck!

I love this game but please fix these: 1)Things in the same place when you die 2)The house is bigger 3)Show like a heart beat when Granny is near and not just foot step's. 4) A animal would be cool to help you around the house. 5)More weapons such as, Guns, Knifes, Ect. Lastly that when Granny steps on the bear traps she can get court to and maybe a Granddad! Other then that, This game is amazing and I can't stop playing and be glad to know my hole school is playing it and you hear it every turn you make! Not a joke! Keep it up!  =D

This is an early game with a bunch of potential. I love the game and I'm always playing it but I feel like you can expand the game with these additions. Firstly, why not add in a collectible menu where you can hunt extremely hard-to-find collection of items within Granny's house. Also you could possibly add another, backdoor exit to the house. This would mean being able to escape a different way. Finally you could add another whole game mode where you escape the house in a different way. (You could even add in a whole new mechanic but don't make it too complex!)
description: Welcome to Granny.Granny keeps you locked in her house.Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.You have 5 days.Good luck!The game contains advertisement.
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.
recentChanges: * Opportunity to get a bonus day (only Normal and Easy).
* An extra lock on the main door (Only Hard).
* Now you can drop items on beartraps to disarm them.
summary: Granny keeps you locked in her house.
title: Granny

comments: Love the game except for the new update. I have been saving up for a while for an elite pack and now that I have enough to purchase an elite card pack, you get rid of it! I have been wanting a diamond character and now you took it away from me. How can anyone get a diamond level character now. There is no way to purchase them either as they are elite pack exclusive cards. Not very happy. Waiting for this to be fixed until I'm satisfied.

I love the game so much, it's fun and gory but I used to play this on my IPhone and I got a new phone and I can't transfer my data even with my Facebook connected to it. My new phone is a galaxy s8 and I wonder if I can transfer my iPhone account to my galaxy. I don't to start over while my other phone have great and exclusive characters. Please help.

well, u cant get mobile unlocks from tasks of console game so the fact the info stating u can still get klassic kitana and others to unlock on mobile is cheap lies. and very slow new content, still hackers and cheaters in war factions.  goodjob ruining the experience of us loyal games .

After played this game a few month, i feel kinda boring. Every updating only adding new characters and not to improvised gameplay. The day after day after day, only you can do is tag match with random combo, a silly mini games for special move, no intros or winning pose, and where's the hell iconic fatality or brutality?

Got suspended for violating terms because an update let me do a challenge twice banned me and took back. A baraka not related to said issue can't play online now lol because of an update... No stars dirty Longwood

Favorite Game This is my all time favorite game. I have an old phone I use just for this game with nothing else on it because it's so big. Even with nothing else, I still have to do a factory reset on my phone to delete everything just to reinstall this game every time they decide to do an update!

descriptionHTML:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!
Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game.
Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.

BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.

MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERS
Collect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.  Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D’Vorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.

JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIES
Mortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.  Rank up in your own Faction’s leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.

SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLE
Find other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.

UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAME
Play the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.

NOTICE:
* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.
